flawed_nl_solution:
Lauren sent 65 + 10 = <<65+10=75>>75 pieces of mail on Tuesday.
He sent 75 - 5 = <<75-5=70>>70 pieces of mail on Wednesday.
And sent 70 + 15 = <<70+15=85>>85 pieces of mail on Thursday.
Therefore, he sent 65 + 75 + 70 + 85 = <<65+75+70+85=925>>925 pieces of mail.
#### 925

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 295, not 925. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
